scripts.db:generate: docker-compose exec scripts bun prisma generate --schema=./src/db/prisma
scripts.db:push: docker-compose exec scripts bun prisma db push --schema=./src/db/prisma
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec scripts bun prisma migrate dev --schema=./src/db/prisma
scripts.db:deploy: docker-compose exec scripts bun prisma migrate deploy --schema=./src/db/prisma
scripts.db:studio: docker-compose exec scripts bun prisma studio --schema=./src/db/prisma
